analyzed: h'um/ zhes rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas so //

original: na ra gan te /

original: ba ri hri da ye /
analyzed: ba ri hri da ye /

original: n'a ma bsti nam/
analyzed: n'a ma bsti nam/

original: sa ma ya raksha si /
analyzed: sa ma ya raksha si /

original: si ti bi na badzra /
analyzed: si ti bi na badzra /

original: aa mri to ta kam/
analyzed: aa mri to ta kam/
translated: amṛtodakam

analyzed: zhes dam tshig dam pa byin no //

analyzed: aom a'a:h'um zhes sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dam pa byin no //
translated: Om āḥ hūṃ. Thus he gave the sacred consecration of body, speech, and mind.

original: aom badzra aa mri ta /🔽ae hye hi sarba ma na h'um hr'i tha zhes dbang dam @229a *//
analyzed: aom badzra aa mri ta / ae hye hi sarba ma na h'um hr'i tha zhes dbang dam @229a *//

analyzed: pa byin no //
translated: e hye hi sarva mana hūṃ hrīḥ. Thus he gave the sacred empowerment.

analyzed: de nas yang las kyi srin po des rang gi ris kyi lha la gsol ba btab pa / sngon tshe gong nas 'brel pa yi //

analyzed: bdag gi nye gnas gang lags pa //
translated: from previous lifetimes,

original: las 'phro dang ni thugs rje yis //
analyzed: las 'phro dang ni thugs rje yis //
translated: through karmic connection and compassion,

analyzed: da lta nyid du 'bab par shog /
translated: may he descend right now.

original: ces bskul bas /
analyzed: ces bskul bas /
translated: Thus he invoked.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor h'um gi snying po 'od zer dang bcas pas kho na nyid kyi snying gar thim pas rang gi ris dam pa nyid du nges par gyur to //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor h'um gi snying po 'od zer dang bcas pas kho na nyid kyi snying gar thim pas rang gi ris dam pa nyid du nges par gyur to //
translated: Glorious Vajrasattva from the realm of space descended to the center of the sun mandala with the essence of hūṃ and light rays and dissolved into the heart of the rākṣasa. He became certain of his own sacred class.

analyzed: ham; zhes mthong ba yongs su dag ste thams cad ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo //
translated: Haṃ means that the vision is completely pure, seeing everything distinctly and completely.

original: rdo rje zhes ming btags nas rdo rje theg pa'i gsang sgor bzhag go /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ming btags nas rdo rje theg pa'i gsang sgor bzhag go /
translated: Having been named vajra, they are placed in the secret door of the Vajra Vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: From the Great Heap of Jewels Tantra:

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
translated: The chapter on the encouragement of the transcendent state of all buddhas is the thirtieth.

original: de nas las kyi srin po de'i nye gnas 'dus pa'i tshogs phal po che rnams rang rang gi las dag pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po mthong ba dang / byin rlabs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyud sbyangs pas las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyud dang /
analyzed: de nas las kyi srin po de'i nye gnas 'dus pa'i tshogs phal po che rnams rang rang gi las dag pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po mthong ba dang / byin rlabs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyud sbyangs pas las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyud dang /
translated: Then, the retinue of that karma rākṣasa, the great assembly of followers, purified their individual karma, saw many buddhas, and purified the continuum of the light rays of blessings.

original: skye ba snga phyi mtha' yas pa dus gcig tu gshegs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye ba snga phyi mtha' yas pa dus gcig tu gshegs par 'gyur te /
translated: The continuum of karma and the ripening of karma and the beginningless and endless past and future lives will be simultaneously traversed.🔽Having cut through doubt, the great lords such as Maheśvara wept and said:

original: the tshom chad pa'i sgo nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te /
analyzed: the tshom chad pa'i sgo nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te /
translated: Having cut off their doubts, the great gods such as Mahesvara wept and said:🔽

original: @229b gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: @229b gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
translated: Lord of Dance, please listen and consider this!

original: bdag cag ru tra'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams //
analyzed: bdag cag ru tra'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams //
translated: We who are attached to the limits of Rudra,

original: lus dang las kyi 'khor ba'i dra ba 'di //🔽bka' yi gtan tshigs zhib mos ma bkrol zhing //
analyzed: lus dang las kyi 'khor ba'i dra ba 'di // bka' yi gtan tshigs zhib mos ma bkrol zhing //
translated: In this net of samsara of body and karma,🔽Have not been liberated by the detailed reasoning of the Buddha's words,

original: shes rab zab mo dmigs bus ma phye bas //
analyzed: shes rab zab mo dmigs bus ma phye bas //
translated: And the profound wisdom has not been revealed by the guide.

original: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan zhing //
analyzed: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan zhing //
translated: We do not possess the mind of self-aware wisdom,

original: nges par legs pa'i gros kyis mchod de //
analyzed: nges par legs pa'i gros kyis mchod de //
translated: And have not been honored by the counsel of definitive goodness.

original: gar thabs glog gi zhags pas ma zin pas //
analyzed: gar thabs glog gi zhags pas ma zin pas //
translated: Not caught by the lasso of the dance-like lightning,

original: rnam shes las kyi rgya mtsho'i dbas bsgribs te //
analyzed: rnam shes las kyi rgya mtsho'i dbas bsgribs te //
translated: We are obscured in the middle of the ocean of karma and consciousness,

original: de nyid de bzhin nyid du ngo ma 'tshal //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin nyid du ngo ma 'tshal //
translated: And do not recognize thatness as suchness.

original: gti mug rang sems bdag tu bzung pas nongs //
analyzed: gti mug rang sems bdag tu bzung pas nongs //
translated: We erred by grasping our own deluded mind as a self.

original: shin tu 'gyod pas gnong ba'i tshul bzung bas //
analyzed: shin tu 'gyod pas gnong ba'i tshul bzung bas //
translated: With deep regret, we adopt a shameful attitude,

original: dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabs su mchi //
translated: And take refuge in you, Great Hero.

original: dngos po sbyang phyir bdag lus gdan du dbul //
analyzed: dngos po sbyang phyir bdag lus gdan du dbul //

original: thabs mkhas thugs rjes lus 'di bzhes su gsol //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rjes lus 'di bzhes su gsol //
translated: With skillful compassion, please accept these bodies.

original: zhes rang gi lus zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo //
analyzed: zhes rang gi lus zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo //
translated: Thus, he offered his own body as a seat for the feet of the guru.

original: de nas 'grin nag po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams kyis ngus nas smras te gsol ba /
analyzed: de nas 'grin nag po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams kyis ngus nas smras te gsol ba /
translated: Then the great nāgas, such as Kālika, wept and said:

original: gzi brjid rgyal po mnga' bdag dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: gzi brjid rgyal po mnga' bdag dgongs su gsol //
translated: “Powerful lord, king of splendor, please consider us!

original: srid pa'i dra bar 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
analyzed: srid pa'i dra bar 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
translated: We who wander in the net of existence

original: bcing ba lnga yis kun tu bcings gyur pa //
analyzed: bcing ba lnga yis kun tu bcings gyur pa //
translated: Are completely bound by the five fetters.

original: sus kyang ma bcings bcing bar byed med de //
analyzed: sus kyang ma bcings bcing bar byed med de //
translated: No one bound us, nor did we bind ourselves.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog las kyis bcings //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog las kyis bcings //
translated: We are bound by the concepts of grasping at a self.

original: sna tshogs lus dang 'du shes gnas la sogs //
analyzed: sna tshogs lus dang 'du shes gnas la sogs //
translated: With various bodies, perceptions, and so forth,

original: bdag 'dzin grong khyer gsum gyi btson ra 'dir //🔽'khor ba'i btson @230a *//
analyzed: bdag 'dzin grong khyer gsum gyi btson ra 'dir // 'khor ba'i btson @230a *//
translated: In this prison of the three cities of self-grasping,

original: chas rnam shes bcings pa la //
analyzed: chas rnam shes bcings pa la //
translated: The fetters of saṃsāra bind the consciousness.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa ma bkrol bas //🔽kun tu bcings pa'i mdud pa rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa ma bkrol bas // kun tu bcings pa'i mdud pa rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: Until the knots of grasping at a self are untied,🔽The continuous knots of being completely bound

original: mi shigs dgrol bar dka' yi sdug bsngal las //
analyzed: mi shigs dgrol bar dka' yi sdug bsngal las //
translated: Are indestructible and difficult to untie.

original: thugs rje'i mdud dgrol thabs kyis dgrol du gsol //
analyzed: thugs rje'i mdud dgrol thabs kyis dgrol du gsol //
translated: Please untie the knots of compassion with the method of liberation.

original: zhes lus sku'i rgyan du phul lo //
analyzed: zhes lus sku'i rgyan du phul lo //
translated: Thus, he offered his body as an ornament.

original: de nas srin po'i rgyal po sha trang gseng bu la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas srin po'i rgyal po sha trang gseng bu la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol pa /
translated: Then, the king of the rākṣasas, Śatrana, and the others, having been extremely frightened, said:

original: dpa' bo sgeg po chen po dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: dpa' bo sgeg po chen po dgongs su gsol //
translated: Great hero, most handsome one, please consider us!

original: mya ngan gling du 'khyams pa'i bdag cag rnams //
analyzed: mya ngan gling du 'khyams pa'i bdag cag rnams //
translated: We who wander in the land of misery,

original: me chen 'bar bas gdungs shing sreg 'gyur ba //
analyzed: me chen 'bar bas gdungs shing sreg 'gyur ba //
translated: Are tormented and burned by the blazing great fire.

original: sus kyang ma bsregs sreg par mi byed de //
analyzed: sus kyang ma bsregs sreg par mi byed de //
translated: No one burns us, nor do we burn ourselves,

original: mi zad rnam smin drag po nyid las byung //
analyzed: mi zad rnam smin drag po nyid las byung //
translated: But it arises from our own unbearable, inexhaustible ripening.

original: zhe sdang 'bar bas rang rgyud bsregs pa la //🔽bdag 'dzin khong nas 'bar ba ma bsad pas //
analyzed: zhe sdang 'bar bas rang rgyud bsregs pa la // bdag 'dzin khong nas 'bar ba ma bsad pas //
translated: Our own mindstream is burned by the blazing hatred,🔽But we do not kill the self-grasping that blazes from within.

original: kun tu sreg cing gdung ba rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: kun tu sreg cing gdung ba rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: Thus, we are continuously burned and tormented.🔽Please send down a rain of the cool water of compassion🔽From the clouds of your great compassion🔽To extinguish the fire of our afflictions

original: mi zlogs zhi bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las //🔽thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun dbab tu gsol //
analyzed: mi zlogs zhi bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las // thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun dbab tu gsol //
translated: And to pacify the suffering that is difficult to reverse.🔽From now on, we will be the servants of the hero,

original: ji ltar kha ba len rdo la lcags 'du ltar //🔽deng nas bzung ste dpa' bo'i 'bangs su mchi //
analyzed: ji ltar kha ba len rdo la lcags 'du ltar //🔽deng nas bzung ste dpa' bo'i 'bangs su mchi //
translated: Just as iron is attracted to the lodestone.

original: zhes so so'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bstabs so //
analyzed: zhes so so'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bstabs so //
translated: Thus they offered their own skulls filled with blood.

original: de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa /
translated: Then the assembly of those with wrong views wept and wailed, saying:

original: kun snang mun sel sgron ma dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: kun snang mun sel sgron ma dgongs su gsol //
translated: “All-illuminating lamp, dispeller of darkness, please consider us!

original: mun nag smag tu @230b 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
analyzed: mun nag smag tu @230b 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
translated: We have wandered in the darkness of the night.

original: lam nor lam stor kun tu 'thoms 'gyur te //
analyzed: lam nor lam stor kun tu 'thoms 'gyur te //
translated: We have lost our way and are completely confused.

original: sus kyang ma bkag 'gog par byed med de //
analyzed: sus kyang ma bkag 'gog par byed med de //
translated: No one has stopped us or made us stop;

original: bdag tu rmongs pa'i ma rig mun pas bsgribs //
analyzed: bdag tu rmongs pa'i ma rig mun pas bsgribs //
translated: we are obscured by the darkness of ignorance, confused about self.

original: rnam shes gti mug mun pas 'thibs pa la //🔽bdag tu rmongs pas mun pa ma gsal bas //
analyzed: rnam shes gti mug mun pas 'thibs pa la // bdag tu rmongs pas mun pa ma gsal bas //
translated: Our consciousness is shrouded by the darkness of delusion.🔽Because of confusion about self, the darkness is not illuminated.

original: kun nas bsgribs pa'i mun nag rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: kun nas bsgribs pa'i mun nag rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: It is completely obscured, with continuous darkness.

original: smag chen sangs par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la //
analyzed: smag chen sangs par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la //
translated: The suffering of this great darkness is difficult to dispel.

original: mkhyen rab gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan du gsol //
analyzed: mkhyen rab gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan du gsol //
translated: Please show us the lamp of clear wisdom.”

original: zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //
analyzed: zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //
translated: Thus they went to him as their supreme refuge.

original: de nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol pa /
translated: Then the assembly of humans and non-humans wept and wailed, saying:

original: thabs mkhas thugs rje sman pa dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rje sman pa dgongs su gsol //
translated: Skilled in means, compassionate physician, please consider us.

original: grong khyer gsum du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
analyzed: grong khyer gsum du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
translated: We wander in the three cities,

original: 'khor ba'i gcong rnying nad kyis zin gyur pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i gcong rnying nad kyis zin gyur pa //
translated: Seized by the chronic disease of saṃsāra.

original: sus kyang ma bzung 'dzin par byed med de //🔽bdag 'dzin nyon mongs ma rig nad kyis bzung //
analyzed: sus kyang ma bzung 'dzin par byed med de // bdag 'dzin nyon mongs ma rig nad kyis bzung //
translated: No one has held us, no one has made us be held.🔽We are seized by the disease of the afflictions of self-grasping and ignorance.

original: zug rngu bzod dkas rnam shes gzir pa la //
analyzed: zug rngu bzod dkas rnam shes gzir pa la //
translated: The pain is unbearable, and our consciousness is tormented.

original: dngos por 'dzin pa'i gcod rnying ma sbyangs pas //
analyzed: dngos por 'dzin pa'i gcod rnying ma sbyangs pas //
translated: The chronic disease of grasping at things is not cured.

original: kun nas gdung ba'i zug rngu rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: kun nas gdung ba'i zug rngu rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: The pain of being tormented all around is uninterrupted.

original: thar med 'tsho bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las //
analyzed: thar med 'tsho bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las //
translated: From the suffering of being alive without liberation,

original: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis sbyang du gsol //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis sbyang du gsol //
translated: Please cure us with the medicine of skilled means and compassion.

original: zhes lus 'bangs su phul lo //
analyzed: zhes lus 'bangs su phul lo //
translated: Thus they offered their bodies as subjects.

original: de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol ba //
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol ba //
translated: Then the assembly of yakṣas wept and supplicated:

original: thabs @231a *// mkhas thugs rje gru gzings dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: thabs @231a *// mkhas thugs rje gru gzings dgongs su gsol //
translated: Skilled in means, compassionate captain, please consider us.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
translated: We wander in the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: sdug bsngal rba klong 'jings su bying gyur pa //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rba klong 'jings su bying gyur pa //
translated: We are sinking in the depths of the waves of suffering.

original: sus kyang ma mnan gnon par byed med de //
analyzed: sus kyang ma mnan gnon par byed med de //
translated: No one is pressing us down, nor is there anyone to press us down.

original: rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa'i ri bos mnan //
analyzed: rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa'i ri bos mnan //
translated: We are pressed down by the mountain of conceptual grasping at things.

original: las kyi chu bos 'khor bar g-yengs pa la //
analyzed: las kyi chu bos 'khor bar g-yengs pa la //
translated: We are scattered in saṃsāra by the river of karma.

original: dngos por 'dzin pa'i rka mgo ma bsgyur bas //
analyzed: dngos por 'dzin pa'i rka mgo ma bsgyur bas //
translated: Without turning the head of grasping at things,

original: las dbang drag po chu bo rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: las dbang drag po chu bo rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: The powerful river of karma flows without interruption.

original: mi thar 'bog par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las //
analyzed: mi thar 'bog par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las //
translated: Please liberate us from the suffering of being unable to escape,🔽From the difficulty of being submerged,

original: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i gru yis bsgral du gsol //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i gru yis bsgral du gsol //
translated: With the boat of skillful means and compassion.

original: zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //
analyzed: zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //
translated: Thus they went to him as their supreme refuge.

original: de nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa /
translated: Then the assembly of bhūtas wept and wailed, and said:

original: rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol //
translated: Self-arisen king of amṛta, please consider us!

original: dug chen gling du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
analyzed: dug chen gling du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams //
translated: We who wander in the land of great poison,

original: kun nas myos pa myos shing nyams gyur pa //
analyzed: kun nas myos pa myos shing nyams gyur pa //
translated: Completely intoxicated, we are deluded and impaired.

original: sus kyang ma sbyar sbyor bar byed med de //
analyzed: sus kyang ma sbyar sbyor bar byed med de //
translated: No one has mixed it, nor is there anyone to mix it.

original: phyin ci log tu lta ba'i dug gis myos //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu lta ba'i dug gis myos //
translated: We are intoxicated by the poison of mistaken views.

original: dug chen nad kyis rnam shes gzir ba la //
analyzed: dug chen nad kyis rnam shes gzir ba la //
translated: The consciousness of those afflicted by the illness of great poison

original: khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa ma bcad pas //
analyzed: khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa ma bcad pas //
translated: Is not cut from the poisonous root that coils within.

original: dug nad 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: dug nad 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: The suffering of the blazing illness of poison is unceasing.

original: mi bzad bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la //
analyzed: mi bzad bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la //
translated: In the unbearable suffering that is difficult to endure,

original: rang 'byung dag pa'i bdud rtsis byug tu gsol //
analyzed: rang 'byung dag pa'i bdud rtsis byug tu gsol //
translated: Please apply the pure nectar that arises by itself.

original: zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //
analyzed: zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //
translated: Thus, he went to the highest refuge.

original: de @231b nas yang rdo rje srin po des bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de @231b nas yang rdo rje srin po des bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then, Vajra-Rākṣasa spoke:

original: yin no legs so rigs kyi bu //🔽ru tra dag gis khyod re 'khor //
analyzed: yin no legs so rigs kyi bu // ru tra dag gis khyod re 'khor //
translated: Excellent! Son of good family,🔽You are surrounded by Rudras.

original: ru tra dag gis khyod re 'tshog /🔽bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'khor //
analyzed: ru tra dag gis khyod re 'tshog / bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'khor //
translated: You are besieged by Rudras.🔽You are surrounded by self-grasping.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'tshog /🔽zhe sdang dag gis khyod re 'khor //

analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi sprul pa ni tha dad de gsung gi gzugs brnyan ni yi ger snang ba yin la yi ge'i sprul pa ni /
